Encumbered.name: Encumbered
Encumbered.description:
Encumberness : 5 + Brawn

If a character's encumbrance goes over its encumbrance threshold, it is considered encumbered.
Character is granted +1[SETBACK] to every Brawn or Agility test per encumberance point over its encumberance threshold.

Over Encumberness : 5 + (Brawn * 2)

goes over its over encumbrance threshold, it is considered over encumbered.
Character looses its every turn Free Manoeuver, and all encumberance [SETBACK] keep applying.
